doc.summary: Gets the range in which game events should be detected.
doc.text: Gets the range in which game events should be detected. Defaults to 8.

doc.summary: Notifies the block entity of game event.
doc.text: Notifies the block entity of game event.

properties.text: true to indicate the event was handled, false otherwise.

doc.summary: A <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/entity/BlockEntity">BlockEntity</ref> used with <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/tile/BlockBE">BlockBE</ref> can implement this.
doc.text: A <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/entity/BlockEntity">BlockEntity</ref> used with <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/tile/BlockBE">BlockBE</ref> can implement this. Then a <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/gameevent/GameEventListener">GameEventListener</ref> to  listen to <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/gameevent/GameEvent">game events</ref> will be created.
